text: I Pagliacci is a 1915 Italian silent drama film directed by Francesco Bertolini. It is based on the 1892 opera Pagliacci by Ruggero Leoncavallo.Goble p.900 ==Cast== * Bianca Virginia Camagni * Paolo Colaci * Giulia Costa * Annibale Ninchi * Achille Vitti * Umberto Zanuccoli ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan.
